content.question: The slope field shown is for the differential equation <math alttext="the derivative of y with respect to x, equals k y minus 2 times y squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></math>, where <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is a constant. What is the value of <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?
